interest_drivers: New blog post on monitoring compliance in real-time

ai_analysis.summary: The update includes a new blog post on real-time compliance monitoring, indicating AI21's continued focus on enterprise GenAI and knowledge work. While not a breakthrough innovation, it demonstrates the company's ongoing efforts to provide relevant and timely content, potentially influencing its position in the competitive AI/ML landscape.
